tr_s89Title:
OUR CHRISTIAN LIFE AND MINISTRY
MEETING ASSIGNMENT
tr_s89DescFooter: Note to student: The source material and study point for your assignment can be found in the Life and Ministry Meeting Workbook. Please review the instructions for the part as outlined in Instructions for Our Christian Life and Ministry Meeting (S-38).

tr_noMeetingWeek: Walang pulong para sa linggong ito
tr_exportMidweekMeetinDesc: Pumili ng mga iskedyul upang i-export at pumili ng nais mong template. Ito rin ang magiging template sa susunod na pag-export ng iskedyul.
tr_applicationAPSDesc: Because of my love for Jehovah and my desire to help others to learn about him and his loving purposes, I would like to increase my share in the field service by enrolling as an auxiliary pioneer for the period indicated below:
tr_continuousAPS: I desire to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_pioneerApplicationMoral: I am of good moral standing and habits. I have made plans that will enable me to meet the hour requirement.â€”See the June 2013 Our Kingdom Ministry, p. 2.
tr_noteAPSApplication: NOTE: If possible, please submit this application at least a week before you desire to begin your auxilary pioneer service. This application is not to be sent to the branch office but, rather, will be kept by the congregation for its files.
tr_attentionServiceCommittee:
Attention Congregation Service committee:

1. Is the applicant a good example in Christian living, being of good moral character?

2. Persons reproved or reinstated during the past year or those who still have restrictions on them do not qualify.

3. Have you consulted with the appropriate group overseer?
tr_approvingAPSApplication: To be approved by service committee members:
tr_moreInformationForAP: Interested in becoming a full-time pioneer? Apply at hub.jw.org or contact the elders in your congregation.
tr_applicationSubmittedDesc: Susuriin ito ng service committee ng iyong kongregasyon at kung inaprubahan, ipapaalala ito sa iyo
tr_continuousAP: I wish to serve continuously as an auxiliary pioneer until further notice.
tr_monthsPendingAP: Nakapagpasa ka na ng aplikasyon para sa auxiliary pioneer sa mga susunod na buwan: {{ months }}. Maaari kang mag-apply sa susunod pang mga buwan anumang oras.
tr_monthsApprovedAP: Ikaw ay inaprubahan na maglingkod bilang auxiliary pioneer sa buwan ng: {{ months }}. Maaari kang mag-apply sa susunod pang mga buwan anumang oras.
tr_findScheduleByScanningQRCode: Hanapin ang pinakabagong version ng iskedyul sa pag-scan ng QR code o sa Organized app mismo.
